body_html: @andrei-pokrovsky, just coming back from Chinese New Year leave. We have a repo with MKL convolution optimization integrated and functionally verified. This repo is based pytorch v0.2 and we have been shifting to latest code base in our internal branch. This repo serves as a prototype design with CPU perf. optimization, more work is still WIP. We will propose PR gradually, following guidelines from PyTorch community of course.

body: @andrei-pokrovsky, just coming back from Chinese New Year leave. We have a [repo](https://github.com/intel/pytorch) with MKL convolution optimization integrated and functionally verified. This repo is based pytorch v0.2 and we have been shifting to latest code base in our internal branch. This repo serves as a prototype design with CPU perf. optimization, more work is still WIP. We will propose PR gradually, following guidelines from PyTorch community of course.
